Most Helpful Customer Reviews

A great read
By Customer on 14 Jan 2008
I am a great fan of Alan Clayson, as i'm sure many of you are. He seems to like all the same music as me, and therefore, writes a number of books which I find very interesting. Of course bands such as Radiohead and the Stones arent bands lacking in fanbase. The book itself offered a great insight into the stones lives before i became enamoured with them. Clayson is a fantastic writer, his style is one that i'm sure can be appreciated by anyone. Any Stones fan should own this!
